subject: Horse Racing
Horses
lead_paragraph: Summer Bird became the first 3-year-old since Easy Goer in 1989 to win the Belmont, win the Travers and then beat older horses in the Gold Cup.
snippet: Summer Bird became the first 3-year-old since Easy Goer in 1989 to win the Belmont, win the Travers and then beat older horses in the Gold Cup.
